ethers.utils
console.log(`Balance: ${ethers.utils.formatEther(balance)} ETH`);
const balance = await ethers.provider.getBalance("0xf39Fd6e51aad88F6F4ce6aB8827279cffFb92266");

ethers
const accounts = await ethers.provider.listAccounts();
